name: Online Checkers With Friends
description:
:: Checkers supports 24 languages ::

- 2 boards: 6x6, 8x8
- 3 difficulty levels
- online play

Checkers is a well-known, fun, classic board game. Beat your opponent by taking their pieces!

Main features:
-1 Player mode: play against your device
-2 Player mode: play with a friend on one device
-Online mode: challenge your friends or random opponents via Game Center

Choose your favourite board size and difficulty level!
You can choose from one of two available boards
There are three difficulty levels, choose the right one for your skill!
